data.eml:eml: A new genus and two new species of hymenosomatid crabs (Crustacea: Brachyura: Hymenosomatidae) from the southwestern Atlantic and eastern Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santana, William (2015): A new genus and two new species of hymenosomatid crabs (Crustacea: Brachyura: Hymenosomatidae) from the southwestern Atlantic and eastern Australia. Zootaxa 3905 (1): 91-106, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.1.5
